name: IDentity (itch) (Ali Bingul)
description:
You can use W,A,S,D for movement. Each time you collect certain amount of chips, a new talent opens. You can shoot with left mouse button and use shield for Q. If you collect all chips, defeat all enemies and go to the door which is placed on the lowest floor, the game will end. The game file is in a .rar file. Remember to extract the game files after downloading the game.

The game was developed in 72 hours for MagaraJam3#
